summary:
Weekly Shōnen Jump is a popular Japanese manga magazine for boys. It has been published every week since 1968 and is known for action-packed and funny stories. The magazine is very successful, with over 7.5 billion copies sold. It has featured many famous manga series like "One Piece" and "Dragon Ball."

The magazine has sister publications and a digital version, and it has inspired anime, video games, and international editions, making it a huge part of pop culture.
title: Weekly Shōnen Jump
